pullrequest.title: Feature system part 4.5: use gz11 deps and update gtest

content.raw:
I updated the debian metadata to add a `libignition-mathX-eigen3-dev` package:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math6-release/pull-requests/2/eigen3-component/diff
* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math5-release/pull-requests/5

I've made new builds with the eigen3 package for math5; I just need to run the builds again for math6; I'll try it today
content.html:
I updated the debian metadata to add a libignition-mathX-eigen3-dev package:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math6-release/pull-requests/2/eigen3-component/diff
  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math5-release/pull-requests/5

I've made new builds with the eigen3 package for math5; I just need to run the builds again for math6; I'll try it today
